name: Heritage of Arreat
flavorText: Worn by savage winds and violence, the blood-stained leather has held up well.
flavorTextHtml: Worn by savage winds and violence, the blood-stained leather has held up well.
description: Provides transmogrification plans for Heritage of Arreat themed armaments.
descriptionHtml: Provides transmogrification plans for Heritage of Arreat themed armaments.
